inputs.buildCommand: npm install -g n && n 18.17.0 && ln -sf /usr/local/n/versions/node/18.17.0/bin/node /usr/local/bin/node && ln -sf /usr/local/n/versions/node/18.17.0/bin/npm /usr/local/bin/npm && hash -r && npm run build && npx next export
inputs.installCommand: npm install -g n && n 18.17.0 && ln -sf /usr/local/n/versions/node/18.17.0/bin/node /usr/local/bin/node && ln -sf /usr/local/n/versions/node/18.17.0/bin/npm /usr/local/bin/npm && hash -r && npm install
